name: boat-simulation
description: 小船自主导航仿真程序 - 基于HTML5 Canvas和PathFinding.js的Web前端应用

scripts.build: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (!fs.existsSync('public')) fs.mkdirSync('public'); fs.copyFileSync('index.html', 'public/index.html'); fs.copyFileSync('boat.svg', 'public/boat.svg');"

author: Developer
